Description: Provide secure, isolated workspaces for each customer organization
As a platform user, I want to securely authenticate using email/password or SSO so that I can access my organization's workspace
Acceptance Criteria:
- Email/password authentication with bcrypt hashing
- JWT tokens with 24h expiry and refresh tokens
- Google OAuth 2.0 integration
- Microsoft Azure AD integration
- Password reset via email
- Account lockout after 5 failed attempts
- Session management

Description: As a platform administrator, I want to create and manage organizations so that customers have isolated workspaces
Acceptance Criteria:
- Create organization with name, domain, settings
- Invite users to organization via email
- Role-based access control (Owner, Admin, Member, Viewer)
- Organization-level settings
- Data isolation between tenants

Description: As a logged-in user, I want to see a dashboard with my projects and recent activity so that I can quickly navigate to my work
Acceptance Criteria:
- Dashboard shows active projects (BUILD/RUN)
- Recent activity feed
- Pending approvals counter (from Harbyx)
- Quick actions menu
- Navigation sidebar
- Responsive design

Description: Provide reliable, scalable data storage with full audit capabilities
As a developer, I want a well-designed database schema so that the platform can scale and maintain data integrity
Acceptance Criteria:
- PostgreSQL with proper indexes
- Multi-tenant schema with organization_id
- Soft delete support
- Audit columns
- Database migrations
- Seed data

Description: As a platform, I want to store and search document embeddings efficiently so that AI agents can retrieve relevant knowledge
Acceptance Criteria:
- pgvector extension enabled
- Documents table with vector column
- HNSW index for similarity search
- Multiple knowledge bases per org

Description: Provide secure, scalable API infrastructure
As a frontend developer, I want a well-documented REST API so that I can build the UI efficiently
Acceptance Criteria:
- OpenAPI 3.0 specification
- Consistent error response format
- Request validation
- Rate limiting per organization
- API versioning (v1)
- Swagger UI documentation

Description: As a user, I want to receive real-time updates so that I see agent progress and approvals immediately
Acceptance Criteria:
- WebSocket server with authentication
- Room-based subscriptions
- Event types for Harbyx webhook relay
- Automatic reconnection
- Presence tracking

Description: Integrate Harbyx (app.harbyx.com) as the governance layer for human-in-the-loop AI agent control
As a developer, I want to integrate the Harbyx SDK so that all agent actions are governed
Acceptance Criteria:
- Install aasp-sdk package
- Configure API key securely
- Create Harbyx client wrapper service
- Test connection to Harbyx API
- Handle authentication errors gracefully

Description: As a platform administrator, I want to define approval policies in Harbyx so that agent actions are evaluated correctly
Acceptance Criteria:
- Create Type A policy (Acknowledgement - auto-approve low-risk)
- Create Type B policy (Approval required - scope, design)
- Create Type C policy (Go/No-Go - production deployments)
- Map policies to agent action types
- Configure approver roles per policy

Description: As a developer, I want to wrap agent actions with Harbyx governance so that every action is evaluated before execution
Acceptance Criteria:
- Create @governed_action decorator
- Automatically call Harbyx /ingest endpoint
- Handle ALLOW -> proceed with action
- Handle BLOCK -> raise exception with reason
- Handle REQUIRE_APPROVAL -> wait for decision
- Pass approval context to agent

Description: As an approver, I want to see and act on pending approvals so that I can make timely decisions
Acceptance Criteria:
- Fetch pending approvals from Harbyx API
- Display approval cards with context
- Show action details and diff when available
- Approve/Reject buttons with comment
- Real-time updates via Harbyx webhooks
- Filter by type, agent, status

Description: As an administrator, I want to view the audit trail from Harbyx so that I can investigate and demonstrate compliance
Acceptance Criteria:
- Fetch audit logs from Harbyx
- Display in timeline view
- Search by date, agent, action type
- Show full action context on expand
- Export to CSV/JSON
- Link to related approvals

Description: As a platform, I want to receive real-time events from Harbyx so that the UI updates immediately
Acceptance Criteria:
- Configure Harbyx webhook endpoint
- Handle action.blocked events
- Handle approval.requested events
- Handle approval.resolved events
- Push updates to frontend via WebSocket
- Verify webhook signatures

Description: Manage BUILD/RUN project phases with Harbyx-governed transitions
As a project manager, I want to move projects through defined phases so that delivery follows a consistent process
Acceptance Criteria:
- BUILD workflow phases defined
- RUN workflow phases defined
- State transitions trigger Harbyx policy check
- Phase history tracked
- Workflow visualization

Description: As a project stakeholder, I want to see the current phase and progress visually so that I understand where the project stands
Acceptance Criteria:
- Visual workflow timeline
- Current phase highlighted
- Approval status from Harbyx
- Click to view phase details
- Transition buttons (governed by Harbyx)

Description: Track all work items in a unified system
As a product owner, I want to create and manage backlog items so that all work is tracked
Acceptance Criteria:
- Item types: Epic, Story, Task, Bug, Risk, ADR
- Parent-child relationships
- Status workflow
- Priority levels
- Assignee and labels
- Estimation

Description: As a team member, I want to view work on a kanban board so that I can see progress at a glance
Acceptance Criteria:
- Drag-and-drop kanban
- Customizable columns
- Swimlanes
- Quick filters
- Card preview
- WIP limits

Description: Coordinate multiple specialized agents efficiently with Harbyx governance
As a platform, I want to manage agent instances and configurations so that agents can be deployed and monitored
Acceptance Criteria:
- Agent type registry (7 agents)
- Agent configuration per org
- Health monitoring
- Versioning
- All agents use @governed_action decorator

Description: As a workflow engine, I want to invoke the right agent at the right phase so that agents work together seamlessly
Acceptance Criteria:
- Phase-to-agent mapping
- Sequential and parallel execution
- Input/output passing
- Error handling via Harbyx
- Timeout handling
- Harbyx approval integration

Description: Automate platform analysis and risk identification
As a tech lead, I want the agent to scan the platform and document current state
Acceptance Criteria:
- Scan Salesforce org metadata
- Generate As-Is snapshot
- Identify customizations
- Map dependencies
- Governed by Harbyx Type A policy

Description: As a tech lead, I want automatic risk identification so that we address issues proactively
Acceptance Criteria:
- Security risks
- Performance risks
- Technical debt
- Compliance risks
- Risk scoring

Description: Transform requirements into actionable backlog
As a product owner, I want automatic requirement analysis so that nothing is missed
Acceptance Criteria:
- Parse natural language
- Extract requirements
- Detect ambiguities
- Suggest questions

Description: As a product owner, I want automatic story breakdown so that I have a ready backlog
Acceptance Criteria:
- Generate Epics
- Break into Stories
- Write acceptance criteria
- Estimate points
- Governed by Harbyx Type B policy

Description: Generate professional technical designs
As a design authority, I want automatic design document generation
Acceptance Criteria:
- Solution overview
- Data model diagrams
- Integration points
- Configuration specs
- Governed by Harbyx Type B policy

Description: As an architect, I want automatic ADR creation so that decisions are documented
Acceptance Criteria:
- Generate ADR from decisions
- Context and problem
- Options considered
- Decision and rationale

Description: Complete agent suite implementation with Harbyx governance
Design review and risk analysis agent
Acceptance Criteria:
- Design review checklist
- Risk identification
- Alternative suggestions

Description: Execution and deployment agent with Harbyx Type C governance
Acceptance Criteria:
- Enhanced MCP integration
- Deployment orchestration
- Rollback capability
- Governed by Harbyx Type C policy for production

Description: Automated testing and validation agent
Acceptance Criteria:
- Test case generation
- Test execution
- Validation checking

Description: Operational tasks and incident handling agent
Acceptance Criteria:
- Incident triage
- Runbook execution
- Monitoring setup

Description: Bi-directional sync with Jira Cloud
Connect to Jira Cloud with OAuth 2.0
Acceptance Criteria:
- OAuth 2.0 connection
- Secure credential storage
- Health check

Description: Sync issues between platform and Jira
Acceptance Criteria:
- Sync Epic, Story, Task, Bug
- Map status workflows
- Sync comments
- Real-time webhooks

Description: Connect with GitHub for code and CI/CD
Connect to GitHub as GitHub App
Acceptance Criteria:
- GitHub App installation
- Repository access
- Webhook setup

Description: Sync PRs and issues with backlog
Acceptance Criteria:
- Link PRs to backlog items
- Auto-update on merge
- Workflow triggers

Description: Microsoft Teams notifications and approvals
Microsoft Teams integration for notifications
Acceptance Criteria:
- Bot commands
- Approval cards (relayed from Harbyx)
- Channel notifications

Description: Connect with ServiceNow for ITSM
Connect to ServiceNow for incidents and changes
Acceptance Criteria:
- Instance connection
- Sync incidents to RUN
- Create change requests

Description: Connect with Salesforce CI/CD tools
Integrate with Salesforce deployment tools
Acceptance Criteria:
- Trigger deployments (governed by Harbyx)
- Receive status
- Rollback support

Description: Support Microsoft Power Platform
Connect to Microsoft Dataverse
Acceptance Criteria:
- Azure AD auth
- Metadata API
- CRUD operations

Description: Scan Power Platform environment
Acceptance Criteria:
- Environment discovery
- Component mapping

Description: Support Adobe Experience Platform
Connect to Adobe Experience Platform
Acceptance Criteria:
- Adobe IMS auth
- Schema access

Description: Connect to Adobe Journey Optimizer
Acceptance Criteria:
- Journey discovery
- Audience access

Description: Framework for adding new platforms
Create SDK for building platform adapters
Acceptance Criteria:
- Standard interface
- Auth abstraction
- Documentation

Description: Delivery and agent performance metrics (leveraging Harbyx data)
Track delivery performance metrics
Acceptance Criteria:
- Lead time
- Cycle time
- Throughput
- Deployment frequency

Description: Pull agent metrics from Harbyx audit logs
Acceptance Criteria:
- Success rate per agent
- Approval wait time
- Blocked actions count

Description: Create custom reports
Acceptance Criteria:
- Drag-and-drop builder
- Export to PDF/Excel

Description: Usage tracking and billing integration
Track platform and agent usage
Acceptance Criteria:
- API call tracking
- Agent execution tracking
- Harbyx usage correlation

Description: Billing via Stripe
Acceptance Criteria:
- Subscription management
- Usage-based billing

Description: Production-ready infrastructure
Security review (partial coverage from Harbyx SOC 2)
Acceptance Criteria:
- OWASP Top 10 review
- Dependency audit
- Leverage Harbyx SOC 2 compliance

Description: Deploy to Kubernetes cluster
Acceptance Criteria:
- Helm charts
- ConfigMaps and Secrets
- TLS setup

Description: Automated deployment pipeline
Acceptance Criteria:
- GitHub Actions workflow
- Environment promotion
